item.title: Star Wars: Rebellion
item.description:
Star Wars: Rebellion

I just watched the first review of Star Wars: Rebellion and it totally confirmed the opinion I had first formed after hearing about it on the Shut Up And Sit Down Podcast. This seems to be an amazing, epic, cinematic game that captures everything from the original movie trilogy in the same way that War of the Rings captured that trilogy. I can't wait to get my hands on it and play it to death.

item.title: Getting Ready for Pandemic Legacy
item.description:
Getting Ready for Pandemic Legacy

After an easily won game of  Pandemic before dinner, my wife agreed that we are finally ready to tackle the awesome epicness of Pandemic Legacy, currently rated as the world's best board game.
